column1: #13 matrices: 7 with percentages and 6 with gene counts
# SEMI      : Counts gene copies of genome A up to number of copies in genome B.
# EVERYTHING: Count all genes of genome A as long as the other genome has a copy.
#Percentages of genes shared between two genomes. Gene counts are divided either by the sum of one or both genomes
#1 Percentage SEMI gene counts. Derived from #11 & #12

column2: genome left column. Derived from #11 & #11 diagonal

column1: #3 Percentage DISTINCT gene counts. Derived from #7 & #8
#4 Percentage DISTINCT based on genome in left column. Derived from #7 & #7 diagonal
#5 Percentage informative DISTINCT based on both genomes. Derived from #9 & #10
#6 Percentage EVERYTHING gene counts based on genome in left column. Derived from #13 & #13 diagonal
#1 Percentage based on SEMI gene counts of both genomes (#11 & #12)
#2 Percentage based on SEMI gene counts and the genome in the left column (#11 & diagonal #11)
#3 Percentage based on DISTINCT gene counts of both genomes (#7 & #8)
#4 Percentage based on DISTINCT gene counts and the genome in the left column (#7 & diagonal #7)
#5 Percentage based on informative DISTINCT gene counts of both genomes (#9 & #10)
#6 Percentage based on EVERYTHING gene counts and the genome in left column (#13 & diagonal #13)
#13 shared EVERYTHING genes based on left column
